title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 42.4 - Agreements with municipalities, State agencies, public authorities and other entities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 42.4 - Agreements with municipalities, State agencies, public authorities and other entities

State Regulations

The department may enter into agreements with municipalities, other State agencies, public authorities and any other entities regarding the
development, operation and/or maintenance of the facilities provided for in
section
42.1
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
42.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
